modules.name: Content Relevance
modules.description: Evaluates how well content aligns with AI search intent and semantic understanding
insights: Content shows strong alignment with AI search queries in 65% of pages
Semantic depth is above average for SaaS industry
Topic clustering could be improved for better AI understanding

issues.title: Missing semantic context in product pages
issues.description: Product pages lack sufficient context for AI systems to understand use cases

issues.title: Inconsistent topic coverage
issues.description: Some key topics have fragmented coverage across multiple pages

recommendations: Add structured data markup to enhance semantic understanding
Create comprehensive topic clusters with clear hierarchical relationships
Include more contextual examples and use cases in product descriptions

modules.name: Entity Authority
modules.description: Measures brand authority and entity recognition in AI knowledge graphs
insights: Brand entity is recognized in major knowledge graphs
Strong backlink profile supports authority signals
Wikipedia presence enhances entity recognition

issues.title: Incomplete entity profile
issues.description: Some key entity attributes are missing from structured data

recommendations: Enhance schema.org markup with complete organization details
Build more authoritative citations from industry publications
Maintain consistent entity mentions across all content

modules.name: Contextual Signals
modules.description: Analyzes contextual markers that help AI systems understand content purpose
insights: Clear purpose indicators present in 60% of content
Contextual headers are well-structured
Missing explicit intent signals in some sections

issues.title: Weak contextual markers in blog content
issues.description: Blog posts lack clear contextual signals about their purpose and audience

recommendations: Add explicit purpose statements at the beginning of articles
Use clear section headers that indicate content intent
Include contextual metadata in page headers

modules.name: Semantic Structure
modules.description: Assesses how well content is structured for AI parsing and understanding
insights: Strong use of semantic HTML elements
Content hierarchy is well-defined
Good use of lists and structured data

issues.title: Some pages lack proper heading hierarchy
issues.description: A few pages skip heading levels which can confuse AI parsing

recommendations: Maintain consistent heading hierarchy (h1 → h2 → h3)
Use semantic HTML5 elements (article, section, nav)
Ensure all content blocks have clear semantic meaning

modules.name: Trust & EEAT Signals
modules.description: Evaluates expertise, experience, authoritativeness, and trustworthiness indicators
insights: Strong author credentials displayed on key pages
Good use of citations and references
Company credentials are well-presented

issues.title: Missing author attribution on blog posts
issues.description: Some blog posts lack clear author attribution and credentials

recommendations: Add author bylines with credentials to all content
Include publication dates and update timestamps
Showcase team expertise and company achievements more prominently

modules.name: AI Citation Readiness
modules.description: Measures how likely content is to be cited by AI systems in responses
insights: Content format is citation-friendly
Clear source attribution present
Some content lacks the depth needed for authoritative citations

issues.title: Shallow content depth in some areas
issues.description: Some pages lack the comprehensive depth that AI systems prefer for citations

recommendations: Expand key pages with more comprehensive, in-depth content
Include original research and data to increase citation value
Format content with clear sections that are easy to extract and cite

modules.name: Conversational Optimization
modules.description: Assesses content optimization for conversational AI search interfaces
insights: Content answers common questions effectively
Good use of FAQ-style sections
Some content is too technical for conversational queries

issues.title: Missing natural language question patterns
issues.description: Content doesn't explicitly address how users might ask questions conversationally

recommendations: Add FAQ sections that mirror conversational query patterns
Use natural language in headings and subheadings
Include direct answers to common "how" and "what" questions
